title: Dashboard loads within 2 seconds with accurate data
description: Verify that the dashboard page loads completely within 2 seconds and displays correct financial summaries, urgent task alerts, and upcoming appointments as per backend data.

steps.description: Login with valid user credentials
Navigate to Dashboard page
Verify page fully loads within 2 seconds
Verify monthly financial summaries match backend data
Verify urgent task alerts are displayed correctly
Verify upcoming appointments are listed accurately

title: User registration with valid data
description: Check that a new user can register successfully with valid credentials and all mandatory profile data.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Fill in valid registration details (email, password, display name, etc.)
Submit registration form
Verify registration succeeds and user is redirected to onboarding

title: Authentication session management and security
description: Verify user sessions are properly created, maintained, and invalidated on logout, including token expiration handling and protection against unauthorized access.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials
Verify session token is created and stored securely
Access protected pages to confirm session validity
Logout from the application
Verify session token is invalidated and protected pages are not accessible
Simulate token expiration and check user is logged out or prompted to re-authenticate

title: Create, assign, tag, and transition Kanban tasks
description: Ensure that users can create new Kanban tasks, assign them to users, add tags, and transition them across dynamic columns correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Tasks (Kanban) page
Create a new task with title, description, and tags
Assign the task to a user
Verify task is visible in the initial column with correct details and tags
Drag and drop task to next column representing status change
Verify task status is updated accordingly and reflected persistently
Attempt invalid transitions if applicable and verify errors/blocks

title: Financial entry management with categories and attachments
description: Test adding, editing, and deleting financial entries while verifying category classification, attaching documents, and checking summary reports for accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to Financial Management page
Add revenue entry with category and attachment document
Verify the entry appears correctly with proper category and attachment accessible
Edit entry details including category and attachment
Verify updates persist and display accurately
Delete the entry
Verify entry is removed and financial summaries update accordingly

title: Upload, status tracking, and linking of contracts to payments
description: Confirm users can upload contract documents, update their status, and correctly link contracts to related financial payments.

steps.description: Navigate to Contracts page
Upload a new contract document
Verify the contract is listed with correct metadata and status
Update contract status (e.g., pending, signed, completed)
Verify status updates reflect immediately
Link the contract to a related payment or invoice entry
Verify linkages are visible and functional between contract and payment records

title: Client portal project and billing info display securely
description: Ensure that clients accessing the secure portal see up-to-date and accurate project status, invoices, and billing information, and that unauthorized access is prevented.

steps.description: Login as client with portal token
Verify project status is current and matches backend data
Verify invoices and billing information are displayed accurately
Attempt to access data for other clients
Verify unauthorized data access is blocked

title: Responsive UI layout across devices
description: Verify the application's user interface renders and functions consistently on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices, including layout adaption and element visibility.

steps.description: Access application from desktop browser
Verify UI elements are properly laid out with all features accessible
Access application from tablet device or emulator
Verify UI adapts to tablet screen size and functions correctly
Access application from mobile device or emulator
Verify UI adapts to mobile screen size, menus collapse appropriately, and all functionality remains usable

title: Lead capture via customizable bio profile creates CRM prospect
description: Test that submitting a lead capture form on the public bio profile successfully creates a new CRM prospect and triggers user notification.

steps.description: Navigate to public bio profile
Fill and submit lead capture form with valid data
Verify a new prospect entry is created in the CRM
Verify the user receives notification of new lead
